briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate a Drug (Dasotraline) on the Safety, Effectiveness and How Well the Body Tolerates it, in Adults With Moderate to Severe Binge Eating Disorder
officialTitle: A 12-week, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group, Placebo-controlled, Fixed-dosed, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Dasotraline in Adults With Moderate to Severe Binge Eating Disorder
summary: A study to evaluate a drug (dasotraline) on the safety, effectiveness and how well the body tolerates it, in adults with moderate to severe binge eating disorder

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Number of Binge Days
